channel.title: NPC attacking - Delta -

item.title: NPC attacking - Delta -
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

does anyone know which packet I need to throw this in for it to work?

if(attacknpc == 55 && Quest1 == 0) { sM("blah blah"); }

and I need it to return the sM if When you click attack on the npc but you dont meet the quest stage req, or you know vice versa, I also tried NPCID or w/e the method is atm I tried it in first click,second click,third click,attacking npc, packets still just goes straight to combat and doesnt send the message even if you dont meet the req.

Read full topic
